external_games.name: Sumikko Gurashi: Tobidasu Ehon to Himitsu no Ko

name: Sumikko Gurashi: Tobidasu Ehon to Himitsu no Ko
summary: A party game featuring 20 comical and humorous minigames based on the concept of picture books such as Momotaro, Little Red Riding Hood, Arabian Nights, The Little Mermaid, and The Little Match Girl. Each minigame is playable with a single Joy-Con and supports up to four players.
